data.title: Timetables
data.text:
To allow for road works and temporary lights between Friday 9th August and Monday 12th August, Broomfield Road (at Broomknowes Road) is inaccessible.

During the disruption all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Service 8 towards Parkhead.

Normal route Broomknowes Road at Boghead Road, left Boghead Road, right Campsie Road, left Broomfield Road normal route.

Service 8 towards Partick.

Normal route Broomfield Road at Campsie Road, right Campsie Road, 2nd left Boghead Road, right Broomfield Road normal route.

To allow for emergency resurfacing works on Friday 9th August from 19:00 until Saturday 10th August 06:00 South Frederick Street will be closed.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Services 6, 18, 240, 255, 263 & 267 towards St Vincent Place.

Ingram Street at South Frederick Street, Ingram Street, Queen Street, St Vincent Place.

To allow for resurfacing works on Thursday 15th August until Monday 19th August Cairnhill Road will be closed.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Service 202 towards Airdrie:

Calderbank Road, Brownsburn Road, Carlisle Road, South Biggar Road, Gartleahill, Gartlea Road, A89 then 2nd exit at Broomknoll roundabout to resume normal route.

Service 202 towards Maxim:

Broomknoll Street, Weavers Road, A89 2nd main exit at roundabout onto Gartlea Road, Gartleahill, South Biggar Road, Carlisle Road, Brownsburn Road and 1st exit at roundabout Calderbank Road to resume normal route.

Due to works on Tuesday 13th August from 09:00 until 15:30 Stepps Road/Auchinloch will close.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Service X85 and X87 towards Buchanan Bus Station

Auchinloch Road, Lindsaybeg Road and Initiative Road to resume normal route

Service X85 and X87 towards Kirkintilloch

Initiative Road at Stepps Road, Lindsaybeg Road and Auchinloch Road to resume normal route

To allow for Bridge checks on Monday 12th August 20:00 until Tuesday 13th August 06:00 Argyle Street between Newton Street and North Street will be closed West Bound.

During the closure all stops will be observed and the following diversions will be in operation:

Services 1, 1A, 1B, 1C, 1D, X4. towards Scotstoun:

Argyle Street, James Watt Street, Broomilaw, North Street and Clyde Expressway to normal route.

To allow for works on Friday 9th August 20:00 until Saturday 10th August 06:00, the M8 Junction 27 on slip westbound will be closed.

During the closure the following diversion will be in place:

Service 77 towards Glasgow Airport.

Renfrew Road at M8 Junction 27, Weir Street, Old Sneddon Street, Love Street, Inchinnan Road, Sanderling Road, exit on the roundabout at Glasgow Airport access road to normal route.

To allow for Motorway Works on Monday 5th August until Friday 9th August, M8 J22-23 West Bound will be closed from 20:00 until 06:00 each night.

500 services towards Glasgow Airport are diverted via the M8, J1, right at Dumbreck Road, left at Paisley Road West, exit at Helen Street, and the M8 West Bound.

Due to major roadworks on West Hamilton Street, Motherwell, from Monday 22nd July until works are complete, all services are subject to delay and some will operate a revised route.

Service 241 and 266 will not serve Brandon Parade, passengers should use West Hamilton Street (opposite Aldi) for Wishaw and Watson Street (at ASDA) for North Motherwell or Hamilton journeys.

Service 254 will terminate at Brandon Parade and commence service from Motherwell Station. West Hamilton Street and Watson Street will not be served.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused, which unfortunately is due to circumstances out with our control. Passengers are advised to plan their journey in advance.

To allow for resurfacing works from Monday 12th August until Friday 16th August, Torbothie Road will be closed.

266 services in both directions are diverted via Station Road, Main Street and Stane Road, omitting Springhill.

To allow for road works from Monday 12th August until Friday 16th August, Bellziehill Roundabout North Section will be closed between 20:00 and 06:00 each night.

Services 240 and N240 towards Bellshill will be diverted via A725 Bellshill Bypass, James Street over flyover, A725 Bellshill Bypass and Gartcosh Walk to commence the route.
